attributes.action: Stop Bus Cuts in Borrowdale & Cumbria
attributes.additional_details: We are a small community in rural cumbria, Very popular with tourists, Borrowdale has an hourly bus service (78) which runs hourly from 10am until 6pm bringing tourists into the area and locals to work, shops, hospitals in near by Keswick, from November this service is being severely cut back, the last bus will be 1:20pm. This will sever the main artery for this valley, meaning losses of jobs and less tourism in one of the most beautiful places in Britain
